title: NameError: name 'fn' is not defined
body_html:
This error occurs at the LSTM layer of my model.

Looks like this bug was reportedly solved in the master branch, #5948

but I installed my version of pytorch via the instructions on the website:

pip3 install torch torchvision

# macOS Binaries dont support CUDA, install from source if CUDA is needed

Using Macbook Pro OSX 10.11.6 El Capitan.

And am still running into it.

I'm using a conda environment, with conda version 4.5.0
and python version 3.5.4

I tried installing pytorch from source using the instructions on the github main page, but ran into this error:

nvcc fatal   : Unsupportnvcec fatal   : Unsudp pgoprut eadr cghpiut eacrtcuhriet e'cctoumrpeu t'ec_o6m1p'u
te_61'
CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /Users/benjamingencheClM/aaknea cEornrdoar/ eantv sA/Tdeln-_pgyetnoerrcaht/epdy_tToHrCcThe/nastoern./cmake[2]: buu.iol*** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCStorageCopy.cu.o] Error 1.dR/esl
reca/sAeT.ecnm/aCkMea:k2e1F9i l(emse/sAsTaegne.)d:i
r / _E_r/rTorH Cg/e.n/eArTaetni_ngge
n e r/aUtseedr_sT/HbCeBnljaasm.icnug.eon
c
h
el/anaconda/envs/dl-pytorch/pytorch/aten/bumake[2]: il*** Waiting for unfinished jobs....d
/src/ATen/CMamake[2]: ke*** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCStorage.cu.o] Error 1F
iles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATemake[2]: n*** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCSleep.cu.o] Error 1_
generated_THCTensor.cu.o


make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorCopy.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensor.cu.o] Error 1
nvcc fatal   : Unsupported gpu architecture 'compute_61'
CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /Users/benjamingenchel/anaconda/envs/dl-pytorch/pytorch/aten/build/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o


make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o] Error 1

make: *** [all] Error 2

So, can't use master, can't use pip version.
body_text:
This error occurs at the LSTM layer of my model.
Looks like this bug was reportedly solved in the master branch,  #5948
but I installed my version of pytorch via the instructions on the website:

pip3  install torch torchvision


# macOS Binaries dont support CUDA, install from source if CUDA is needed

Using Macbook Pro OSX 10.11.6 El Capitan.
And am still running into it.
I'm using a conda environment, with conda version 4.5.0
and python version 3.5.4
I tried installing pytorch from source using the instructions on the github main page, but ran into this error:
nvcc fatal   : Unsupportnvcec fatal   : Unsudp pgoprut eadr cghpiut eacrtcuhriet e'cctoumrpeu t'ec_o6m1p'u

body:
This error occurs at the LSTM layer of my model.

Looks like this bug was reportedly solved in the master branch,  https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5948 

but I installed my version of pytorch via the instructions on the website:

> pip3  install torch torchvision 

> \# macOS Binaries dont support CUDA, install from source if CUDA is needed

Using Macbook Pro OSX 10.11.6 El Capitan. 

And am still running into it. 

I'm using a conda environment, with conda version 4.5.0
and python version 3.5.4

I tried installing pytorch from source using the instructions on the github main page, but ran into this error:

```
nvcc fatal   : Unsupportnvcec fatal   : Unsudp pgoprut eadr cghpiut eacrtcuhriet e'cctoumrpeu t'ec_o6m1p'u
te_61'
CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /Users/benjamingencheClM/aaknea cEornrdoar/ eantv sA/Tdeln-_pgyetnoerrcaht/epdy_tToHrCcThe/nastoern./cmake[2]: buu.iol*** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCStorageCopy.cu.o] Error 1.dR/esl
reca/sAeT.ecnm/aCkMea:k2e1F9i l(emse/sAsTaegne.)d:i
r / _E_r/rTorH Cg/e.n/eArTaetni_ngge
n e r/aUtseedr_sT/HbCeBnljaasm.icnug.eon
c
h
el/anaconda/envs/dl-pytorch/pytorch/aten/bumake[2]: il*** Waiting for unfinished jobs....d
/src/ATen/CMamake[2]: ke*** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCStorage.cu.o] Error 1F
iles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATemake[2]: n*** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCSleep.cu.o] Error 1_
generated_THCTensor.cu.o


make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorCopy.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensor.cu.o] Error 1
nvcc fatal   : Unsupported gpu architecture 'compute_61'
CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /Users/benjamingenchel/anaconda/envs/dl-pytorch/pytorch/aten/build/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o


make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o] Error 1
nvcc fatal   : Unsupported gpu architecture 'compute_61'
CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCTensorMath.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /Users/benjamingenchel/anaconda/envs/dl-pytorch/pytorch/aten/build/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATen_generated_THCTensorMath.cu.o


make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorMath.cu.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

So, can't use master, can't use pip version.
